title: Startup Theory: Fit World
description: Tom Bilyeu gives business advice to Rob Howze of Fit World, a fitness startup that produces health and wellness products and resources to empower people to live healthier more prosperous lives. Fit World is an app, in Beta phase, that allows for a two-way live stream so that health and wellness coaches and trainers can help people in real time. Learn more at http://fitworldwide.net/ Startup Theory is a series in which Tom Bilyeu talks to founders about their startups and gives them advice on how to cut through the noise and truly make an impact. If you would like your company to be featured on Startup Theory, send us an email at connect@impacttheory.com
